description: Classic ADX momentum strategy using directional movement indicators and momentum confirmation for trend following. Updated to use new Freqtrade v3 interface.
author: Gert Wohlgemuth

populate_indicators.description: Calculate ADX system indicators with momentum and SAR
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate ADX with period 14
2. Calculate Plus DI with period 25
3. Calculate Minus DI with period 25
4. Calculate Parabolic SAR
5. Calculate Momentum with period 14

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with ADX system indicators: adx, plus_di, minus_di, sar, mom
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Implements the complete ADX system for trend analysis with momentum confirmation and SAR for trend following.

populate_entry_trend.description: Generate long entry signals using ADX strength, momentum, and directional movement
populate_entry_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 25 (sufficient trend strength)
2. Check momentum > 0 (positive momentum)
3. Check Plus DI > 25 (strong bullish movement)
4. Check Plus DI > Minus DI (bullish dominance)
5. If all conditions true, set enter_long = 1
populate_entry_trend.output_description: DataFrame with enter_long column indicating entry signals (1 = enter, 0 = no action)
populate_entry_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies strong bullish trends with positive momentum and directional movement confirmation.

populate_exit_trend.description: Generate long exit signals using ADX strength, momentum, and directional movement reversal
populate_exit_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 25 (sufficient trend strength)
2. Check momentum < 0 (negative momentum)
3. Check Minus DI > 25 (strong bearish movement)
4. Check Plus DI < Minus DI (bearish dominance)
5. If all conditions true, set exit_long = 1
populate_exit_trend.output_description: DataFrame with exit_long column indicating exit signals (1 = exit, 0 = no action)
populate_exit_trend.logic_explanation: Identifies trend reversal when momentum turns negative and directional movement favors bearish action.

populate_buy_trend.output_description: Not implemented - uses new entry/exit interface
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Strategy uses the newer Freqtrade v3 interface with entry/exit trend methods.

populate_sell_trend.output_description: Not implemented - uses new entry/exit interface
populate_sell_trend.logic_explanation: Strategy uses the newer Freqtrade v3 interface with entry/exit trend methods.

indicators.name: ADX
indicators.description: Average Directional Index - measures trend strength

indicators.name: Plus DI
indicators.description: Plus Directional Indicator - measures upward price movement strength

indicators.name: Minus DI
indicators.description: Minus Directional Indicator - measures downward price movement strength

indicators.name: SAR
indicators.description: Parabolic Stop and Reverse - trend following indicator

indicators.name: Momentum
indicators.description: Price momentum indicator for trend confirmation

buy_conditions.description: Strong bullish trend with positive momentum (entry)
buy_conditions.logic: ADX > 25 AND momentum > 0 AND Plus_DI > 25 AND Plus_DI > Minus_DI

sell_conditions.logic: ADX > 25 AND momentum < 0 AND Minus_DI > 25 AND Plus_DI < Minus_DI
